properties.description: Community Cafe and Social Space where everything is free of charge. We have table tennis, pool and board games available. Also free hot and cold drinks, a cooked lunch, snacks and sweet treats. We also have items of clothing, welfare bags containing toiletries and blankets available free of charge.
